title: FS - T201 Double Folder Huggins Bresnahan
author: acowan19

posts.post_title: FS - T201 Double Folder Huggins Bresnahan
posts.post_content:
For sale is 1911 T201 Mecca Double Folder of Huggins and Bresnahan.  The card is in excellent condition!  Corners are a little soft, but not rounded or dinged.  Edges and surface are great with no creases or wrinkles that I can see.  The card was purchased from a friend and was already in the thick lucite holder with label.  The back of the holder has sticker residue which appears over the card.  I'm asking $200 for this card.  I only want to sell, so please, no trade offers.  If you are interested in this card please email me at [url]acowan19@gmail.com[/url].  Front and back scan can be seen here:

[url]http://s134.photobucket.com/albums/q102/acowan19/For%20Sale%20Net54/[/url]
